title.label: BEST GAME I'VE EVER PLAYED TWICE!!!

I love this game. I would give 100 stars if i could!
Just love it

Really, there are so many cool features in the game it's amazing. The diversity of all the different stages really introduces a new kind of fun as you keep playing. You can customize your character which is clever, and there's something strangely satisfying about landing on & crushing those skeletons. Reminiscent of the old Wario games, there are just too many great features around every corner. I hardly ever enjoy tilt control games, and it might be nice to see an update with a touch control option, however I can always count on losing a bit of time having fun with this game. Well worth the money and highly recommended for any old school platform fans!

title.label: Great game! But needs more chapters

content.label: This game is addicting and so much fun! But I finished all the chapters in less than a week, too easy and not enough levels :(
Awesome :D
If you're going to get one game where a pizza destroys armies of skeletons, this is it. Gameplay is fun and diverse, and the premise is too silly to pass up.
This is the best game I played and I love the graphics.Please make an update.I love it.

title.label: Fantastic game, now runs great on iPhone 6+

content.label: This is one of the rare gems on the App Store that stands out from all other apps. It has a huge variety of mini game style levels that start easy but get very difficult by the end. This game is a ton of fun, and with the recent update, it now works perfectly with the iPhone 6+. Thanks for the quick patch Riverman Media!
